synopsis.p: Computes word embeddings using the CONTES/Gensis implementation.

description.p: Computes word embeddings using the CONTES/Gensis implementation.

param-doc.name: jsonFile
param-doc.p: File where to write embeddings as a JSON object.

param-doc.name: sentenceLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: txtFile
param-doc.p: File where to write embeddings as a table.

param-doc.name: vectorFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store embeddings of each token. If this parameter is not set, then embeddings are not stored in any feature.

param-doc.name: vectorSize
param-doc.p: The dimensionality of the feature vectors. Often effective between 100 and 300.

param-doc.name: windowSize
param-doc.p: The maximum distance between the current and predicted word within a sentence.

param-doc.name: workers
param-doc.p: Use this many worker threads to train the model (=faster training with multicore machines).
